June 21, 2019 Emma Bell, Virginie Verrez, Edgaras Montvidas, Rosalind Plowright, Donnie Ray Albert Blu-Ray. DVD. Studio: BBC / Opus Arte. Subtitles: French, German, Japanese, Korean.

cast: Emma Bell, Virginie Verrez, Edgaras Montvidas, Rosalind Plowright, Donnie Ray Albert
items.conductor: Award-winning British director Keith Warner. Czech conductor Jakub Hrůša. Filmed with Glyndebourne opera company in East Sussex during their 2018 season.
